sense.gloss: one's own convenience, one's way, selfishness
surroundings, environment, way of doing things
right hand (in archery), hand that pulls the bowstring
unauthorised (e.g. phone app, WWW site), unofficial
overall victory, championship, winning the title
decision of a contest, finals (in sports)
ease of use, user-friendliness, usability, utility, convenience
apt to (do), liable to, prone to, inclined to, tend to
... reaps the rewards, ... takes the prize, ... wins

sdata.j: ↑自分勝手↑↓じぶんがって↓にするつもりはない。
sdata.e: I don't intend to be selfish.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑戦↑↓たたか↓いに↑勝↑↓か↓った。
この↑評論↑↓ひょうろん↓を↑優勝↑↓ゆうしょう↓↑作品↑↓さくひん↓に↑選↑↓えら↓んだ↑基準↑↓きじゅん↓は↑何↑↓なん↓ですか。
sdata.e: What criterion did you use when you elected this essay as the winner?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑絶対↑↓ぜったい↓↑勝↑↓か↓てないってあなた↑言↑↓い↓った？
sdata.e: Did you say that I could never win?

sdata.j: やった！↑2↑↓に↓↑回↑↓かい↓↑続↑↓つづ↓けて↑勝↑↓か↓っちゃった！
sdata.e: Yes! I won twice in a row!

sdata.j: ↑早↑↓はや↓まって↑喜↑↓よろこ↓ぶな、↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑笑↑↓わら↓える↑者↑↓もの↓が↑勝↑↓か↓ち。
sdata.e: He laughs best who laughs last.

sdata.j: ↑勝手↑↓かって↓に↑何↑↓なん↓でも↑使↑↓つか↓って。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に、↑勝↑↓まさ↓るとも↑劣↑↓おと↓らずかわいい。
sdata.e: You are not less pretty than her.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑勝手↑↓かって↓に↑出↑↓で↓かけていいよ。
sdata.e: You are free to go out.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑勝手↑↓かって↓に↑好↑↓す↓きな↑事↑↓こと↓をしてよろしい。
sdata.e: You are welcome to do anything you like.

words.gloss: one's own convenience, one's way, selfishness
overall victory, championship, winning the title
